Tactical retreat!
(You can continue without losing
your score or your win chain.)

$aTactical retreat can be ordered only
$a0 more time(s). If you reset your
chain, however, your tactical retreats
will once again be available for use.

You have used the last of your tactical
retreats. If you reset your chain, they
will once again be available for use.

$aDo you want to surrender?
You won't be able to continue.

$aDo you want to surrender?
You won't be able to continue.

Remaining tactical retreats: $a0

Tactical Retreat:
Twice per chain of wins, you can
return to the previous screen
without losing your score or your
chain. If you reset your chain,
however, your tactical retreats
will become available again.

$aIf foe ends movement on this structure's
space and foe's HP ≤ $a0, cancels the
foe's attack, Assist skill, etc. and ends that
foe's action. (Magic traps cannot be disarmed
by Disarm Trap skills.)
This looks like a Hex Trap, but it's just a fake.

A trap that, when stepped on by a foe, ends
that foe's action.

A fake trap that is indistinguishable from a
real trap.
Structures designed to look like traps.

Warning:
When transferring skills that have
prerequisite skills via Inherit Skills,
you must inherit the prerequisite
skills as well. For example, if you
wish to inherit Life and Death 4,
you must inherit the Life and
Death 1, 2, and 3 skills.

Merging Allies:
You can raise an ally's stats
and gain SP by combining it
with an ally that has the same
name and title. The source ally
is lost in the process.

Warning:
Please note that when you raise
an ally's ★ rating, the ally's stat
increases from merging will
be lost.
